subject: Football
Television
Computers and the Internet
Handheld Computers
lead_paragraph: The handheld device allows fans to watch the game they are at, out-of-town games and the NFL Red Zone channel, but one has to wonder if the game itself is not enough anymore.
snippet: The handheld device allows fans to watch the game they are at, out-of-town games and the NFL Red Zone channel, but one has to wonder if the game itself is not enough anymore.
